trans-unit.source: Contains the security descriptor for an object and specifies whether the handle retrieved by specifying this structure is inheritable

seg-source.mrk: Contains the security descriptor for an object and specifies whether the handle retrieved by specifying this structure is inheritable

target.mrk: Contains the security descriptor for an object and specifies whether the handle retrieved by specifying this structure is inheritable

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of this structure

seg-source.mrk: The size, in bytes, of this structure

target.mrk: The size, in bytes, of this structure

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a security descriptor for the object that controls the sharing of it

seg-source.mrk: A pointer to a security descriptor for the object that controls the sharing of it

target.mrk: A pointer to a security descriptor for the object that controls the sharing of it

trans-unit.source: If True, the new process inherits the handle.

seg-source.mrk: If True, the new process inherits the handle.

target.mrk: If True, the new process inherits the handle.
